title: 321 58 "The King of Animals that Overlooks the Sea! The Dream Ship Magnificently Completed!"Transliteration: "Umi o Nozomu Hyakujū no Ō! Yume no Fune Dōdō Kansei!" (Japanese:海を臨む百獣の王! 夢の船堂々完成!) Naoyuki Itō Hirohiko Kamisaka August 26, 2007(2007-08-26)[68] October 25, 2015
transformers_text: 321 58 The King of Animals that Overlooks the Sea The Dream Ship Magnificently Completed Transliteration Umi o No zo mu Hy a kuj no Yume no Fun e D d K ansei Japanese Nao yuki It Hiro hi ko Kami saka August 26 2007 2007 08 26 68 October 25 2015 When the Straw Hats arrive at the coast Ice burg unveils the ship while Franky is nowhere to be seen Ice burg gives his opinion that Franky is hiding because if he were asked face to face to join the crew he would not be able to refuse he wants to go but believes staying in Water 7 is his responsibility Iceberg proceeds to tell the Straw Hats that they might have to make him join the crew by force At the Franky House when Franky refuses to leave Franky's men take matters into their own hands they steal Franky's beloved jammer style briefs and start luring him to the Straw Hats by playing keep away with the briefs with Franky in tow Amid the town while the populace are horrified by the streaking Franky chasing after them Luffy and Chopper show up to assist in the keep away before Sanji and Zoro seize Franky and shove him into the Franky Family's shoot anything cannon and have him shot in front of the new ship Luffy aboard the ship has the briefs and offers to return them to Franky only if he agrees to join the crew
tf_idf_text: king animal overlook sea dream ship magnificently complete transliteration umi kuj yume fun ansei japanese nao yuki hiro kami saka august october straw hat arrive coast ice burg unveils ship franky nowhere see ice burg give opinion franky hide ask face face join crew would not able refuse want believe stay water responsibility iceberg proceeds tell straw hat might make join crew force franky house franky refuse leave frankys men take matter hand steal frankys beloved jammer style brief start lure straw hat play keep away briefs franky tow amid town populace horrify streak franky chase luffy chopper show assist keep away sanji zoro seize franky shove franky familys shoot anything cannon shot front new ship luffy aboard ship briefs offer return franky agrees join crew
